Text: This is great but i'm having issues with the motorway level. Once I've saved all the people, and i begin to pick up the vehicles, the game jam's and says something about missing files or unrecognizable content...? I've tried it over and over and there is just no change. any ideas?
Hello I downloaded it and when i try to install it says please insert disk 1 which contains the file Files/Cars/civil-Vw kafer.ect. please help?!
